features: MOUTHWASH: Listerine zero alcohol mouthwash kills 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath; Leaves your mouth feeling fresh and clean when used as part of your regular oral hygiene routine; Cool Mint flavor.

ZERO ALCOHOL: Bad breath germ killing mouthwash that features a less intense, alcohol free formula and taste that leaves your mouth feeling cleaner than brushing alone; Non alcoholic mouthwash for a refreshing clean that does not feel overpowering.

BAD BREATH TREATMENT: Listerine mouthwash is infused with a cool mint flavor that leaves your mouth feeling clean and freshens breath after only one use; Deep clean effects from the refreshing minty flavor.

#1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED: ADA-Approved and from the #1 Dentist recommended brand for over the counter mouthwashes; Listerine mouthwash has been clinically studied for over 75 years and is the most widely used mouthwash in the world.

INCLUDES: Pack of 1, 1 L mouthwash; Use regularly during your oral care routine to help contribute to overall good oral hygiene; Rinse for 30 seconds both morning and night or otherwise instructed by a dentist or physician.
body.description: Say goodbye to bad breath with Listerine Zero Alcohol Cool Mint Alcohol-Free Mouthwash in a refreshing, less intense Cool Mint flavor. This daily oral rinse mouthwash kills 99.9% of bad breath germs with a less intense taste for a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone. It features flavors found in Listerine Antiseptic Oral Care Mouthwash, but in a less intense alcohol-free mouthwash formula. From the #1 dentist-recommended brand of over-the-counter mouthwashes, this great-tasting Cool Mint flavor of this less intense, fresh breath mouthwash leaves your mouth feeling clean and refreshed. Get 24-hour protection from bad breath germs by rinsing with this minty mouthwash for 30 seconds twice a day, both morning and night as part of a regular oral and dental hygiene routine.*This site contains current product information and may differ from the information on the product packaging you may have.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LISTERINE MOUTHWASH LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol Mouthwash gives you the power to kill millions of germs for a mouth that feels clean and refreshed. No other alcohol-free mouthwash has been proven to kill more bad breath germs. No alcohol. No mess. No sweat. LISTERINE MOUTHWASH LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol Mouthwash gives you the power to kill millions of germs for a mouth that feels clean and refreshed. No other alcohol-free mouthwash has been proven to kill more bad breath germs. No alcohol. No mess. No sweat.

GERMS WILL BEG FOR MERCY What happens each time you swish properly? LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol kills 99.9% of bad breath germs within 30 seconds. THE BOLDEST OF CLEANS Brushing and flossing only go so far. Adding rinsing with LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol provides a greater reach for a whole mouth clean. PROTECT AGAINST BAD BREATH Target the root cause of bad breath by remembering to floss daily, brush and rinse with LISTERINE twice daily for 24-hour bad breath germ protection. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. *IQVIA Survey 2022

Previous page Our Purpose Inspiring the world to discover the transformative impact of a clean mouth on a healthier planet. Our Ingredients We have high safety & efficacy standards, and ingredients inspired by nature and backed by science Our Sustainability We're committed to helping you achieve the best oral care in a way that will help our planet Our History We are pioneers in the science of mouthwash research, and the #1 dentist-recommended mouthwash brand Next page 1 Our Purpose 2 Our Ingredients 3 Our Sustainability 4 Our History

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My first time used it, I liked it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price than supermarket, i like it because it is zero alcohol, not intense than regular one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Priced right and works great, Amazon actually beat Costco on the price of this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Description vs What I received
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the mouth wash with the expectations of that I would receive 2 boxes of six bottles based off the description and reviews. However. I only received 2 bottles which was very disappointing. I waited over a month to receive the item which was fine based off the price & description. I am very unhappy withrhe seller & even more unhappy about the fact there is no contact information for this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved it was not so strong and very smooth tasting I didnt gag made it easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good zero alcohol rinse
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t feel like it cleans as good but it’s great if you just want fresh breath and a bit cleaner mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Refreshing mouth wash. It doesn’t burn like the mint one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After using the mouthwash, I found that my mouth felt cleaner until my next meal. Very refreshing for me, and pleasant for my spouse!
Title said pack of 6 1litre bottles but only one 1litre bottle delivered. Waiting for refund.

reviews.reviewTitle: received one instead of six, waiting for refund
